TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IConnectionPoint

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.* classes are obsolete and supported within 32 bit processes only. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=160862")

summary.span: 提供 OLE DB 介面的實作，以供從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級的應用程式使用。

span.span: Provides an implementation of the OLE DB interface for use by applications upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 進行新開發，請參閱。For new development, see . > [!NOTE] > 函式和物件中命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Advise (IntPtr sink, out int cookie);
.method public newslot virtual instance void Advise([in]native int sink, [out] int32& cookie) cil managed
Public Sub Advise (sink As IntPtr, ByRef cookie As Integer)
public: void Advise(IntPtr sink, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] int % cookie);

param.name: sink
param.span: 接收的參考，讓這個由連接點管理的輸出介面接收呼叫。

span.span: A reference to the sink to receive calls for the outgoing interface managed by this connection point.

param.name: cookie
param.span: 這個方法傳回時，包含連接 Cookie。

span.span: When this method returns, contains the connection cookie.

param.span: 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。

summary.span: 在連接點和呼叫端的接收物件之間建立諮詢連接 (Advisory Connection)。

span.span: Establishes an advisory connection between the connection point and the caller's sink object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 進行新開發，請參閱。For new development, see . > [!NOTE] > 函式和物件中命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: public void EnumConnections (out Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.IEnumConnections enumC);
.method public newslot virtual instance void EnumConnections([out] class Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.IEnumConnections& enumC) cil managed
Public Sub EnumConnections (ByRef enumC As IEnumConnections)
public: void EnumConnections([Runtime::InteropServices::Out] Microsoft::VisualBasic::Compatibility::VB6::IEnumConnections ^ % enumC);

param.name: enumC
param.span: 這個方法傳回時，包含新建立的列舉型別。

span.span: When this method returns, contains the newly created enumerator.

param.span: 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。

summary.span: 建立列舉值物件，以逐一查看存在於這個連接點的連接。

span.span: Creates an enumerator object for iteration through the connections that exist to this connection point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 進行新開發，請參閱。For new development, see . > [!NOTE] > 函式和物件中命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: public void GetConnectionInterface (out Guid piid);
.method public newslot virtual instance void GetConnectionInterface([out] valuetype System.Guid& piid) cil managed
Public Sub GetConnectionInterface (ByRef piid As Guid)
public: void GetConnectionInterface([Runtime::InteropServices::Out] Guid % piid);

param.name: piid
param.span: 這個參數傳回時，包含這個連接點所管理之輸出介面的 IID。

span.span: When this parameter returns, contains the IID of the outgoing interface managed by this connection point.

param.span: 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。

summary.span: 傳回這個連接點所管理之輸出介面的 IID。

span.span: Returns the IID of the outgoing interface managed by this connection point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 進行新開發，請參閱。For new development, see . > [!NOTE] > 函式和物件中命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: public void GetConnectionPointContainer (out Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.IConnectionPointContainer cpc);
.method public newslot virtual instance void GetConnectionPointContainer([out] class Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.IConnectionPointContainer& cpc) cil managed
Public Sub GetConnectionPointContainer (ByRef cpc As IConnectionPointContainer)
public: void GetConnectionPointContainer([Runtime::InteropServices::Out] Microsoft::VisualBasic::Compatibility::VB6::IConnectionPointContainer ^ % cpc);

param.name: cpc
param.span: 這個參數傳回時，包含可連接物件的 介面。

span.span: When this parameter returns, contains the connectable object's interface.

param.span: 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。

summary.span: 擷取在概念上擁有這個連接點之可連接物件的 介面指標。

span.span: Retrieves the interface pointer to the connectable object that conceptually owns this connection point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 進行新開發，請參閱。For new development, see . > [!NOTE] > 函式和物件中命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Unadvise (int cookie);
.method public newslot virtual instance void Unadvise([in]int32 cookie) cil managed
Public Sub Unadvise (cookie As Integer)
public: void Unadvise(int cookie);

param.name: cookie
param.span: 先前從 方法傳回的連接 Cookie。

span.span: The connection cookie previously returned from the method.

summary.span: 關閉先前透過 方法所建立的諮詢連接。

span.span: Closes an advisory connection that was previously established through the method.
